entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
